title: Youngstown Police investigating mother-son murder-suicide
content:
YOUNGSTOWN, Ohio (WKBN) – The Youngstown Police Department and the Mahoning County Coroner’s office are investigating what appears to be a murder-suicide on the 2100 block of Volney Road.
The YPD sent a press release Saturday evening stating the details.
According to it, the mother, 43, and son, 17, were found dead in their home around 2:45 p.m.
